text: Colobothea flavoguttata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1902 and is known from Brazil.BioLib.cz - Colobothea flavoguttata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1902
title: Colobothea flavoguttata
